column5: Final blog post of 2019 is up https://www.northernjacks.com/post/top-5-list-boxing-day-sales-edition 5 outdoor items I am  hoping to grab at various boxing day sales I lucked out this morning and have a few gift cards for Bass Pro and Sail to use One thing I am looking at is a portable fish finder for my kayak Cheers and Merry Christmas all Andrew
